creator: jim_curry@xelus.com
text:
The Oracle jdbc drivers that I am using were distributed as .zip files.  Tomcat 
does not seem to find them in the web-inf\lib directory anymore (am getting a 
class not found error).  As a workaround I tried renaming the extension to .jar 
and everything worked fine.

Not a bug.  The Servlet 2.2 spec in section 9.4 indicates that only jar files
are considered.  Earlier Tomcats may have included all files in WEB-INF/lib.
Since this behavior is not spec compliant, it was fixed. Your solution of
renaming the extension to ".jar" is the correct one for keeping the Oracle
files local to the web application.
